author: costin
msg: The bug is easy to reproduce, and it's important to have the fix in.

author: costin
msg: Added security constraints to the admin app. The admin must add a user
and set the "admin" role for this to work.

author: costin
msg: This is supposed to enable client authentication using certs, but I
haven't tested it yet. The patch seems ok and doesn't brake anything,
and if it does we can fix it.
If anyone can test it maybe we can merge it to 3.2, it would be usefull, but
we need more to make it work with web.xml requirements, docs, etc.

author: costin
msg: Admin is not trusted by default, you have to trust it if you want to run.

author: costin
msg: Added security constraint to admin, merge from 3.2 fix.
